description: An archipelago in the northwestern region of the East Blue, containing at least twenty different communities. The islands are largely agricultural, with plantations of rice and oranges. Nami's hometown of Cocoyasi Village is located here.

keyEvents.title: First Glimpse of Conomi Islands
keyEvents.description: The Conomi Islands are shown for the first time as the Straw Hat Pirates approach, following Nami's trail.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces the setting for the Arlong Park Arc and Nami's backstory.

description: An imposing eight-story structure that serves as the headquarters of the Arlong Pirates on the Conomi Islands. The building features the pirate crew's Jolly Roger at the top and is conspicuously placed at the coast to demonstrate the crew's dominance. The structure includes a weapon storage area and a map room, with a pool connected to the open sea.

keyEvents.title: First Visual of Arlong Park
keyEvents.description: Arlong Park appears for the first time, showing the imposing headquarters of the Arlong Pirates with its distinctive eight-story structure and Jolly Roger.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces the primary location and enemy base for the upcoming Arlong Park Arc.

statusHistory.reason: Building is operational as Arlong Pirates headquarters
